content: zig-zag lace scarf www craftkitten com original pattern by jennifer reeve mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss 1 hank misti alpaca chunky 108 yards 100% baby alpaca bulky weight size m or n 9mm hook aaaabbbbbbbbrrrreeeevvvviiiiaaaattttiiiioooonnnnssss ddddttttrrrr yo 3 times insert hook into st yo pull out of st 5 loops on hook yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through last 2 loops ddddttttrrrr ggggrrrroooouuuupppp work 3 dtr into next st until 1 loop of each re- mains on hook yo and pull through all 4 loops on hook ddddoooouuuubbbblllleeee ddddttttrrrr ggggrrrroooouuuupppp work 3 dtr into same st as last group un- til 1 loop of each remains on hook 4 loops on hook skip 5 sts into next st work 3 dtr until 1 loop of each remains on hook yo and pull through all 7 loops on hook ssssccccaaaarrrrffff chain 123 rrrroooowwww 1111 work 1 half_double_crochet into 3rd chain from hook 1 half_double_crochet in each chain to end turn rrrroooowwww 2222 ch1 work 1 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet to end turn rrrroooowwww 3333 ch5 skip first 3 half_double_crochet work 1 dtr group into next st ch5 *1 double dtr group ch5 repeat from * to last 3 half_double_crochet into same half_double_crochet as last group work 3dtr until last loop of each remains on hook 4 loops on hook 1 dtr into last half_double_crochet until 5 loops remain on hook yo and pull through all 5 loops turn rrrroooowwww 4444 ch1 1 half_double_crochet into top of first group 5 half_double_crochet into 5 chain arch * 1 half_double_crochet into top of next group 5hdc into next 5 chain arch repeat from * to last group 1 half_double_crochet into 5th of 5 chain at beg of previous row turn rrrroooowwww 5555 ch1 work 1 half_double_crochet into each half_double_crochet to end turn fasten_off attach fringe as desired block if desired © craft kitten 2006 all rights reserved do not copy or distribute without permission
